Key Match Events: Garry Rodrigues scored a dramatic stoppage-time winner as the Cape Verde Islands beat Ghana 2-1.
Cape Verde went ahead in the 17th minute when Jamiro Monteiro scored after a shot by Garry Rodrigues was parried by Ghana goalkeeper Richard Ofori.
Ghana equalised 11 minutes into the second half with Alexander Djiku heading home from Jordan Ayew's corner.
Garry Rodrigues scored a late winner in the 90th minute after Ofori spilled a cross.
